sashboards = dashboards in sas?

October 6, 2007

thank you, sas! you finally put up some great examples on how to create dashboards with nothing more than sas/graph. i’m paging between two of stephen few’s books: show me the numbers and information dashboard design. i’d categorize few as an applied version of tufte, who can often be more theoretical than practical.

i’m dissecting the telesales and marketing analysis dashboards…and finding a few new approaches to constructing more usable graphs. good times.

sashboards = dashboards in sas? - October 6, 2007 -
